The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.
_____ has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.
It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other Pokémon to enter.
There is no telling where the tail begins. Despite its short legs, it is quick and likes to chase Ratatta.
